## DataSource.canGetTile() method

Returns `true` if \[\[DataSource\]\] can load tile with given \[\[TileKey\]\] and zoom level.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canGetTile(zoomLevel: number, tileKey: TileKey): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  zoomLevel | number | The zoom level of the \[\[MapView\]\]. |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | The unique identifier for a map tile. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the tile for the given \[\[TileKey\]\] can be loaded.
